system.requirements: Tier 3: Daemonologist, Favoured by the Warp, Willpower 50. Aptitudes: Psyker, Willpower
system.effect: When character triggers Psychic Phenomena when manifesting a power of the Sanctic Daemonology Disicpline, they can spend a Fate Point to entirely negate the result.

description.value: When character triggers Psychic Phenomena when manifesting a power of the Sanctic Daemonology Disicpline, they can spend a Fate Point to entirely negate the result.
